channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: As U.S. and Iran wrap latest round of nuclear talks, Trump weighs his options
item.description: President Trump weighs his military options in Iran as his administration continues negotiating over Tehran's nuclear program.
item.content:encoded: President Trump weighs his military options in Iran as his administration continues negotiating over Tehran's nuclear program.
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: How U.S. allies are bracing for Trump's potential military action against Iran
item.description: NPR's Michel Martin asks former Ambassador and Middle East Special Envoy Dennis Ross about how U.S. allies are bracing for the possibility of U.S. military action against Iran.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Michel Martin asks former Ambassador and Middle East Special Envoy Dennis Ross about how U.S. allies are bracing for the possibility of U.S. military action against Iran.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: VA says it won't enforce rule that would have affected veterans' benefits
item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs has rescinded a new rule after an outcry from veterans, who said it could have lowered their monthly benefits.
item.content:encoded: The Department of Veterans Affairs has rescinded a new rule after an outcry from veterans, who said it could have lowered their monthly benefits.
item.dc:creator: Quil Lawrence

item.title: House Oversight Committee member Rep. Wesley Bell discusses the Clintons' deposition
item.description: Democratic Rep. Wesley Bell of Missouri, a member of the House Oversight Committee, talks about the deposition of the Clintons in the Epstein probe, which continues Friday with the former president.
item.content:encoded: Democratic Rep. Wesley Bell of Missouri, a member of the House Oversight Committee, talks about the deposition of the Clintons in the Epstein probe, which continues Friday with the former president.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Trump weighs his military options in Iran as latest round of talks end, deposition of the Clintons in Epstein probe continues Friday with former president, Paramount wins bid for Warner Bros.
item.content:encoded: Trump weighs his military options in Iran as latest round of talks end, deposition of the Clintons in Epstein probe continues Friday with former president, Paramount wins bid for Warner Bros.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Mourners pay their respects to civil rights leader Jesse Jackson in Chicago
item.description: Jesse Jackson lies in repose in Chicago for a second day at his Rainbow-Push headquarters, as people honor and pay their respects to the late civil rights leader.
item.content:encoded: Jesse Jackson lies in repose in Chicago for a second day at his Rainbow-Push headquarters, as people honor and pay their respects to the late civil rights leader.
item.dc:creator: Cheryl Corley

item.title: Straying from presidential norms, Trump extends his branding to the government
item.description: President Trump is naming a lot of things after himself. Something other presidents have not done.
item.content:encoded: President Trump is naming a lot of things after himself. Something other presidents have not done.
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: Community looking for answers after refugee released from federal custody found dead
item.description: A community and family in Buffalo, New York, are searching for answers after a refugee who had gone missing after being released from federal custody found dead last week.
item.content:encoded: A community and family in Buffalo, New York, are searching for answers after a refugee who had gone missing after being released from federal custody found dead last week.
item.dc:creator: Alex Simone

item.title: Affected by the war in Ukraine, Germany works to recover its economy
item.description: Four years after Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, Germany's economy has transformed, impacted by the effects of war.
item.content:encoded: Four years after Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, Germany's economy has transformed, impacted by the effects of war.
item.dc:creator: Rob Schmitz

item.title: Walter Mondale's hometown wants his childhood home added to the National Register
item.description: Elmore, Minnesota is the childhood home of former Vice President Walter Mondale. Advocates there want to see the house he lived in added to the National Register of Historic Places.
item.content:encoded: Elmore, Minnesota is the childhood home of former Vice President Walter Mondale. Advocates there want to see the house he lived in added to the National Register of Historic Places.
item.dc:creator: Catharine Richert
